amendatorysection.para: The application for such annual license to conduct, operate, and maintain a mobile home park shall be submitted in writing or by electronic format and shall include the full name and address of the applicant or applicants, the names and addresses of the partners if the applicant is a partnership, the names and addresses of the members if the applicant is a limited liability company, or the names and addresses of the officers if the applicant is a corporation, and the current or most recent occupation of the applicant at the time of the filing of the application, and such other pertinent data as the department may require by regulation.
